Text:
function ERU_EP05_20()
    -- .結-3【3月第1週】「ボク姫様と乙女主義」
    SaveData.Title = "ボク姫様と乙女主義"

    -- //BG：屋上（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG017ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ The rooftop illuminated by moonlight. ]])

    MSG([[ Erika stood atop the fence shining in the moonlight. ]])

    MSG([[ Like dancing on a stage, Erika swayed her body on the narrow fence. ]])

    MSG([[ One misstep and she would plummet straight down to the ground far below. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2424.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "E-Erika!? Where exactly are you standing!? P-Please get down quickly..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    -- //BU：アルメリア（邪悪笑み）
    LAYER_LOAD(49,"BG017ce")
    LAYER_POSITION(49,-800,-530)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_ARU01na")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-700,0)
    LAYER_MASK(51,"frame02r",49,50)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0603.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Are you telling me to get off this stage? You... you hate me too, don’t you? Everyone, everyone... why do you all hate me?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2425.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Y-You don’t understand what I’m saying..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ This is no good. Erika seems seriously confused. ]])

    MSG([[ If I provoke her rashly, she might throw herself into the sky. ]])

    MSG([[ I slowly approached the fence, careful not to startle her, and continued trying to calm Erika down. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0214.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "It hurts deep inside my chest... it’s painful... it’s prickling. Hey, how can I clear these feelings? Tell me... please tell me!!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2426.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Please listen to me... Erika-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I raised both hands to show I was unarmed. ]])

    MSG([[ Erika seemed to ease her guard a little, and I felt her hostility lessen. ]])

    MSG([[ At this pace, I could gradually ease her confusion, but then— ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- //SE：ヘリコプターの音
PLAY_SE("SEg002.wav")
WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2427.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Th-That helicopter..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Suddenly, a helicopter flew in, and from its ladder an unexpected figure jumped onto the rooftop. ]])
STOP_SE("SEg002.wav",1000)

    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    -- //BU：ネメシア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MEN01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM19.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0232.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "I won’t let you interfere. We will realize our ambitions no matter what! For that, I’m willing to pay any price!" ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia Himegami. The mastermind of it all stood between me and victory at the last moment. ]])

    MSG([[ Her presence was so overwhelming that I involuntarily took a step back. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2428.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Step aside...! I don’t have time to talk with you!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0233.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "You step aside! Hermes will vanish fleetingly on this national broadcast and become a ‘legend’!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0234.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "And through that, people will see how foolishly they’ve been dancing around the illusion called ‘beautiful girls’!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0235.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Now, Hermes! Your final act as an idol! Show the world the sinfulness of praising someone simply as ‘cute’!" ]])

    MSG([[ I lunged to stop Nemesia’s order. ]])

    -- //SE：身を翻す音
PLAY_SE("SEc022.wav")
WAIT(400)
    -- //SE：床に倒れる音
PLAY_SE("SEc019.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ But the moment I moved, I was thrown away as if she had anticipated it. ]])

    MSG([[ This feeling — it’s the same side defense technique Daria-san used. I never expected Nemesia-san to use it too. ]])

    MSG([[ After the Princess Election appeal and running here, my stamina was near its limit. Facing her now was utterly hopeless. My heart was about to break and my legs trembled. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    MSG([[ But then — I heard a voice. ]])

    -- //BU：エルメス（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_ERU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0604.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Mother’s words must be obeyed... yet why... why won’t my body listen...?" ]])

    MSG([[ Those were certainly the words of Erika rejecting death. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM13.wav")

    MSG([[ Strength returned to my shrinking body. ]])

    -- //BU：エリカ（真剣）

    MSG([[ That’s right. I didn’t come here to defeat Nemesia. ]])

    MSG([[ I came to save Erika. ]])

    MSG([[ There’s no need to fight with someone unrelated. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2429.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Erika-san, please listen!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：エルメス（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_ERU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    MSG([[ I looked away from Nemesia and called out loudly to Erika. ]])

    MSG([[ Finally recognizing me, Erika turned toward me in surprise. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2430.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Certainly, ‘beautiful girls’ tastes change with the times. Someone praised today might be rejected tomorrow!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2431.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "But that doesn’t mean it’s wrong to polish yourself for someone! There must be someone out there who sees you!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：ネメシア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MEN01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0236.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Be quiet! A girl who does not know the pain, suffering, and hatred of being forgotten by the world!" ]])

    -- //SE：打撃音
PLAY_SE("SEc025.wav")
WAIT(400)

    MSG([[ Nemesia grabbed me, trying to throw me aside. ]])

    MSG([[ Her arm strength was terrifying for a woman; my bones creaked. ]])

    MSG([[ But my body wouldn’t give in. As if it wasn’t my own, strength welling up from deep within me. ]])

    MSG([[ It felt like many people were pushing me from behind to reach Erika. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2432.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Nemesia-san, was your sister, Arumu-san, really unhappy? Even now you, who still love her, say her life was a tragedy?!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2433.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Just as I didn’t forget Almeria-san, and you can’t forget Arumu-san... there must be people who remember them. People who love them still!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MEN01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_plus0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "—!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia’s strength faltered. No, my strength was starting to surpass Nemesia’s. ]])

    MSG([[ Drawing on every last drop of power left in my body, I shouted. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2434.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Our efforts! Everyone’s hard work at Yuriai Private Academy! Everyone’s struggle to be cute in this world — I absolutely refuse to call that a ‘tragedy’!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_plus0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "N-No way!? How could the power I sacrificed everything for be defeated by some child...!?" ]])

    -- //BU：なし

STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- //SE：身を翻す音
PLAY_SE("SEc022.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(49,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_MASK(51,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",500,false)

    MSG([[ Finally, I broke free from Nemesia’s grasp. ]])

    -- //BU：アルメリア（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG017ce")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-800,-500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",500,false)

    MSG([[ I ran straight toward Erika standing on the fence. ]])

    -- //effect：最後の特殊選択肢の野次を小さく再生

    MSG([[ Then, suddenly, I noticed many voices echoing from somewhere. Listening closely, I realized who they were and began laughing out loud. ]])

    MSG([[ No wonder I couldn’t stop gaining strength. We had been cheered on all along by so many people. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2435.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Erika-san... please look down." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0215.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Huh?" ]])

    MSG([[ Erika’s eyes lit up as she noticed the scene below. ]])

    MSG([[ I was certain my words were not wrong— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //CG：百合愛学園・エルメスのみ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV043aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0605.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "This is...!" ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM18.wav")

PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav",500,true)
    -- //特殊選択肢：正答なし（ただ、みんなの声が視覚化して流れるだけ）
    -- local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP05_6_ERU,"百合愛学園に響く声――")
    -- Viewモードで選択肢を再生
    HimeSenkyoView(SenkyoData.EP05_6_ERU, 15)

STOP_SE("SEf002.wav")

    MSG([[ The parking lot below glowed with the letters “Erika.” A huge cheer rose up, reaching even the rooftop. ]])

    MSG([[ No need to squint. All the students had gathered, forming Erika’s name with penlights. ]])

    MSG([[ That sight spoke more deeply than any words of everyone’s feelings for Erika. ]])

    MSG([[ Overwhelmed by the scene, Erika silently looked down, tears streaming. ]])

    -- //CG：百合愛学園・エリカ追加
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"EV043ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ I scrambled up beside her and clasped her trembling hand. ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG017ca")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2436.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "At last, I can reach you." ]])

    MSG([[ Her hand was gently returned. ]])

    MSG([[ Unlike before, my hand was much bigger now. But the warmth it conveyed had not changed a bit. ]])

    MSG([[ I felt I had finally reached the back I had always wanted to catch up to. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0217.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Thank you... Mina-chan." ]])
    -- //アルメリア

    MSG([[ Then, the voice of someone I’d never forgotten whispered softly in my ear. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- 　　　　◆

    -- //BG：屋上（夜）
    -- //BU：統合エルメス（通常）、ネメシア（通常）

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG017ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ When Erika, Almeria, and I got down from the fence, Nemesia stood blocking our way. ]])

    MSG([[ Almeria stopped me from stepping forward to protect, and spoke in a calm voice. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AEM01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0218.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "Nemesia Mother. I’m sorry, but we can no longer obey your orders." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AEM01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0219.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "So many people support us. We want to be cute not for you, but for everyone else." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AEM01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0220.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "Erika feels the same way, doesn’t she?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AEM01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0606.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Mother, I’m sorry! But this happiness is the first time I’ve ever felt it!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AEM01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0607.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "To make even more people smile, dying here is an absolute no-no." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AEM01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0608.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I want to be remembered not as a scar your mother talked about, but as gentle, heart-throbbing, and the very cutest memory for everyone." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "" ]])
    -- //ボイスなし

    MSG([[ A long silence followed. ]])

    MSG([[ A warm spring breeze blew across the rooftop. ]])

    MSG([[ As it died down, Nemesia let out an exasperated sigh. ]])

    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0237.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Do as you please. I can’t handle seeing the liveliest face you’ve ever made." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ra")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0238.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "You will surely be praised from now on... After all, cute is justice." ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    MSG([[ Leaving behind sarcastic words, Nemesia departed. ]])

    MSG([[ But to me, her expression looked somehow satisfied. ]])

    MSG([[ Someday, I want to have a slow conversation with her again. Not as an enemy, but as the mother of my precious people. ]])

    -- //BU：エルメス・統合（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AEM01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ The three of us remained alone on the rooftop. Voices calling for Erika still echoed from below. ]])

    MSG([[ Holding my hand, Erika spoke to the Almeria inside her. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AEM01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0609.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Come now, everyone’s waiting. Let’s sing together, Ally." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AEM01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0221.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "H-Here? Why here?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AEM01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0610.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I want to convey this happy feeling to as many people as possible through song!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AEM01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0611.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Because this voice — it’s yours originally, Ally. It hasn’t changed since long ago." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AEM01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0222.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "Erika..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AEM01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    MSG([[ Smiling wryly and looking at me helplessly, Almeria said nothing. I smiled back, released her hand, and gently pushed her forward. ]])

    MSG([[ Almeria lightly jumped onto the fence, higher than her height— ]])

    MSG([[ Spreading her arms toward the students who loved her, she announced the song title. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0223.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "From Me to ‘Princess’ A·B·C" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "Sprite/BG027ac.png")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG, 0, 1500)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask008", 2000, false)

    MSG([[ After that, the legendary song passed down through the academy echoed throughout Yuriai Private Academy— ]])

    -- //ED

    MsgOff()
    STOP_BGM(10000)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG, 0, 0, 15000, Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_LOAD(1, "BG000ab")
    LAYER_ALPHA(1,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(1,255, 10000, Ease.OutSine)
    WAIT(5000)

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //EDムービー
    TrueEndMovie();

    LAYER_LOAD(1, "")
    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP05_21")
end
